programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Selfless Soul Receives Moments of Joy One Surprise at a Time
programme.desc: Kar is a selfless soul known for his unwavering commitment to the unhoused in his community. It's Kar's turn to have some good old-fashioned fun.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: 'Boston Strong' Champs Break Barriers
programme.desc: From a para track and field star, to members of an elite octogenarian rowing team and a once-in-a-generation female quarterback, these groundbreaking athletes are 'Boston Strong.'

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Miya Marcano Story
programme.desc: When homesick college student Miya Marcano books a flight to south Florida for the weekend, her family is thrilled. But when the plane lands, Miya is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown & Beyond: Mind, Body & Soul
programme.desc: From meditating in a salt cave to braving a cold plunge, Rob treats his mind, body and soul to a variety of holistic therapies.

programme.title: Plate It Picklesburgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: A Dream Wedding for Two Elderly Lovebirds
programme.desc: Meet Pat and Patty, an engaged couple who fell on hard times while planning their dream wedding. The team comes together to throw these two a special day they'll never forget!

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Remix Dishes to Savor from the Midwest
programme.desc: Discover where classic dishes collide to create delightful flavors. From pizza debates to the Juicy Lucy to a good old-fashioned red beer, see how regional creativity transforms beloved foods into something more.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Kind-Hearted 10-year-old Gets Showered With Thanks
programme.desc: Catalina, a 10-year-old community hero with a heart of gold spends her days giving back. Today, Meaghan surprises Catalina with a day of her own, from Sea adventures to a new set of wheels and more. It's her time to shine.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Put That Sauce on Anything
programme.desc: Chef Manny Hernandez of Barrels and Boards in Raynham pushes the pace against Chef Ryan Dziki of Wild Fox Pierogi. Will the chefs be able to identify the right ingredients and replicate each other’s sauces before the clock runs out?

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Take a Chicken Yoga Class in Ybor City, FL
programme.desc: In historic Ybor City, different cultures bring out the best in one another. Enjoy an authentic Cuban sandwich or dine at a restaurant now on its fifth generation of ownership. After chicken yoga (yes, that’s a thing!), treat yourself to a hand-rolled cigar.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Date Night Delights
programme.desc: Chefs Jason Taylor and Adam Stayrook will have to chef to impress in today’s Date Night Delights challenge. Will their fancy meals delight the judges? Or will this be a date they wanna forget?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Making Time for Fun
programme.desc: Daniel Johnson juggles three jobs and is a single father to three kids. Kinga meets with Daniel in Pittsburgh, PA to help him ‘clock out’, reconnect with nature, and experience some quality “me time.”

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Art and Mixology Meet Up in Santa Fe
programme.desc: Kate explores gin and rituals with a master distiller, talks art and cocktails with an Indigenous painter, and gets a lesson in moving mixology on George R.R. Martin’s adventure train in the high-desert city of Santa Fe.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Nothing Dull About Sharpsburg
programme.desc: Ed and Day spend the day making their way through Sharpsburg. The guys get physical with MMA, try making pizza, and swing by 4FourSix Distillery and Hitchhiker Brewing for some drinks.

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Experience the Illuminating Wonder of Santa Fe, NM
programme.desc: Immerse yourself in Santa Fe, New Mexico's unique charms! Delve into the bizarre art of Meow Wolf, sample a decadent chocolate flight, and savor a local speciality, the green chile burger. Embrace the unusual in this truly exceptional journey!

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.sub-title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Local radio personality, Greg Adams, wants to shine a light on all parts of his beloved city and prove that Milwaukee has a lot more to offer than people might expect. In each episode, Greg is joined by a notable personality from the community who shows him their favorite spots and the best ways to experience them.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Fire up the grill and pour a cold one. Chefs Carleen King and Neil Blazin are facing off in a Summer Cookout cook-off. Can our chefs keep their cool? Or will they melt down in the summer heat?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: What's On The Menu?

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate it, Pittsburgh!: Between The Bread
programme.desc: In honor of Pittsburgh's love of handhelds, Chef Claudy Pierre and Chef Alex Brown get creative crafting their best sandwich-inspired dishes.

programme.title: Matter of Fact
programme.sub-title: Matter of Fact: Epic Road Trip
programme.desc: From Colorado to Maryland, correspondent Jessica Gomez takes Matter of Fact viewers across the U.S. to talk with Americans about what keeps them up at night – and what keeps them going.

programme.title: Chronicle: Pittsburgh After Dark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) In this episode of "Chronicle," we're going to look at the side of Pittsburgh you don't normally see: When the sun does down and the moon comes up.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: All In The Family
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero asks contestants about real news stories with unreal outcomes for a chance at a cash prize. In "Family Care," locals learn about a resourceful rescue, a bold family tradition and mother-son musicians.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Screens Off, Adventure On!
programme.desc: Camryn Simpson, a 21-year-old student at the University of Pittsburgh and ambassador on social media platforms can’t take time away from her phone. With the help of Kinga, Camryn will log-out of social media and log-in to the outdoors to find adventure.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Jailed Mysteries and Kentucky Tea in Bardstown, KY
programme.desc: Find out why they call them 'yum yums,' make a toast in the Bourbon Capital of the World and follow the clues on a murder mystery train. Want to spend the night with a spector? Stay the night in a former jail that's now a haunted B&B.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Unanswered Questions
programme.desc: A teen murdered but no suspects. A woman allegedly killed by a panhandler

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation Challenge: Screenprinters Pull Paint with True Grit to Honor Old West
programme.desc: It’s time to saddle up as three Oklahoma natives pull themselves to victory creating original screen print deigns encapsulating the Old West. Do these makers have the true grit it takes to be Maker Nation Champion?

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation: Surf + Turf
programme.desc: Beach-inspired resin art in Boston, and elaborate charcuterie boards in Omaha.

programme.title: Always Remember Your Name
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A documentary of mistaken identity, hope, love, and the power of story by two Holocaust survivors.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Fundraising Scams
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.
